entry.title: On Trend Ladies Beige Large Brim Floppy Felt Hat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Hats
Price: 87.99

Ladies Beige Large Brim Floppy Felt hat hand made at the time of your order here in the USA by one of our very talented crafters.  Her hats have been in block buster movies so we know you'll feel like our star in yours!  Large floppy brim felt hat with 2 tone beige large flower, organza bow and natural feather mixture.

entry.title: Ladies Black Victorian Touring Hat with Burgundy #525
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Black Victorian Hats
Price: 84.99

Ladies Black Victorian Touring Hat with Burgundy. This hat is from our first collection and has been a best seller for many years. It has a burgundy satin pleated crown with a burgundy and mauve floral garland in front. It also has burgundy feathers and a burgundy satin and black ribbon lace bow on the side. It is finished off with a black English netting bow in the back.

This hat is made just for you!!  It is made at the time of your order with hand dyed materials and hand assembled here in the USA.

entry.title: Ladies Black Victorian Touring Hat with Plum #617
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Black Victorian Hats
Price: 84.99

Ladies Black Victorian Touring Hat with Plum. It has a plum pleated satin top with deep purple & black flowers, black pleated lace brim and plum feathers. It is finished off with a black bow on the back.

This hat is made just for you!  Our hats are hand made with the most care and attention to detail at the time of your order.  This process can take 7-10 days so please give yourself extra time.

entry.title: Ladies Victorian Black Touring Hat with Red #16080
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Hats
Price: 84.99

Ladies Victorian Black Touring Hat with Red. This is one of our new classic ladies Victorian Touring Hats in black with a red satin pleated crown, black ruffled lace around the brim, black satin bow, black and red roses, red feathers and black satin bow on the back.

This hat is made just for you!  Our hats are hand made with the most care and attention to detail at the time of your order.  This process can take 7-10 days so please give yourself extra time.
